target.name: info
target.echo: The full location of a file is${ant.file}
The version of the Apache Ant is${ant.version}
The version of the JDK that is${ant.java.version}
The default target of the current project is${ant.project.default-target}
Comma separated list of the targets that were invoked in the current project${ant.project.invoked-targets}
The full location of the Ant jar file${ant.core.lib}
The home directory of Ant installation${ant.home}
The home directory for Ant library files - typically ANT_HOME/lib folder${ant.library.dir}
